name: Robert Benjamin
description: AM cheerful and loving person. I am looking for my soul mate. . I like very much to make my partner happy. I am saving all my warmth, my passion and my tenderness for my darling other half. My friends say that I am kind, gentle, passionate, romantic, honest, modest, open minded, well bred, educated, sincere, faithful and gentle. I love to read good books, on Engineering and on Art. , I come from a close and loving family. I am a very sociable, friendly and cheerful person. If we get really close and we decide to meet, , I am willing to come to see you and maybe you ll take me sightseeing in your city, so we can spend a wonderful time together and see if we are perfect for each other. . Its my dream we will fall in love and never want to part. I hope to make your life more interesting and more wonderful ! If your looking for a really nice, kind, loving, sincere and tender man to be your lifetime partner, your best friend and lover, and your faithful husband, I would love to hear from you I am very romantic, sexual, honest, soft, faithful, and loyal to my partner. I cant wait to hear back from you. I hope you find me attractive for you- in my photos and want to have a nice, sincere, and tender relationship with me.
